channel.title: Sketch - Lines on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch - Lines on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks Sketch Macro - Create Line
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create 2D Line through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

For this, I take the example from previous Solidworks Macros - Open Assembly and Drawing document post.

item.title: Solidworks Sketch Macro - Create CenterLine
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create 2D CenterLine through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Solidworks Sketch Macros - Create Line post.
